name: IGN - Dark Red/Blue Theme
description: A modification of the "IGN Dark Theme" to include some blue, slightly lighter paragraph colors and spacing corrections to the unordered lists that make it easier to read at night.
additional_info:
Original Theme from eXo-Necro here: https://userstyles.org/styles/124668/ign-dark-theme

*Style has been updated to v2.1 to fix some content that was too dark. Removed white box backgrounds, fixed layout of tables.
